traits.name: Echolocation
traits.desc: The whale can’t use its blindsight while deafened.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The whale can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.desc: The whale has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fire whale makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail slap.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 34 (7d6 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail Slap
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (2d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Scalding Blast (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: A fire whale can release a blast of superheated air in a 60-foot cone from its blowhole that scalds or burns those contacting it. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 (14d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
